title: Isn't Vayne a bit overtune?
body: Vayne is a scary champion, to the point I am willing to banned her 100% including if my own teammate wants to pick her. She does so much damage just because she got very good burst damage thanks to PTA and Silver Bot. She just take a chunk of my hp with her 3 basic attack.

replies.body: Pretty bad early. Pretty disgusting late. Does no one run lethal tempo? It looks like EVERYONE but me takes PTA. I'm so bad :(

> [{quoted}](name=Tailypo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nHyAfeho,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-16T19:05:25.359+0000)
>
> Pretty bad early. Pretty disgusting late. Does no one run lethal tempo? It looks like EVERYONE but me takes PTA. I'm so bad :(

Lethal Tempo has been discussed a lot on the Mains discord server and the biggest issue we have with it is the fact it takes 1.5 seconds for the attack speed to actually activate.

General thinking is Press the Attack > Fleet Footwork > Lethal Tempo.


Press the Attack does NOT increase the damage of Silver Bolts.

> [{quoted}](name=Tailypo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nHyAfeho,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-16T19:05:25.359+0000)
>
> Pretty bad early. Pretty disgusting late. Does no one run lethal tempo? It looks like EVERYONE but me takes PTA. I'm so bad :(

That's how Hypercarries are designed.

They are weaker early but are a powerhouse late game.

Vayne no longer hits late game at 2 items.


From what I've been reading on the Vayne Mains Discord the new build is {{item:3153}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3026}}


Caitlyn, Ashe, Jinx, Tristana, Twitch, Draven and Jhin can all body her in lane with ease.

Brand, Lux, Zyra, Vel'Koz, Sona, Nami, Blitz, Nautilus, Thresh, Leona are all good supports to pick against her.

No, she's fine now.

Her winrate is down almost 2% after the recent nerfs to her R and Rageblade.


 

{{champion:222}} is overtuned.


Oh, I see why you made this thread.

You played Darius into Vayne and lost.
